entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. A few flurries early this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow near midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023
